name: ListView
desc: A scrollable list of widgets arranged linearly.

fields.name: itemExtent
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.list_view.itemExtent} If non-null, forces the children to have the given extent in the scroll direction.

fields.name: itemExtentBuilder
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.list_view.itemExtentBuilder} If non-null, forces the children to have the corresponding extent returned by the builder.

fields.name: prototypeItem
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.list_view.prototypeItem} If non-null, forces the children to have the same extent as the given widget in the scroll direction.

fields.name: childrenDelegate
fields.desc: A delegate that provides the children for the [ListView].
